axis_supply.supply_status: Strained - Extended supply lines from Tripoli (900+ km) via coastal road. Division positioned around Tobruk siege perimeter with British garrison creating supply challenges. Fuel reserves 6 days (lower than 15. Panzer due to lighter establishment), ammunition 9 days, water critically constrained at 10L/man/day (desert operations). Heavy reliance on captured British supplies. Supply base: Tripoli port with forward dumps at Derna and Gazala.

allied_supply.supply_status: Adequate for East Africa campaign operations in Q2 1941. Division operating in Ethiopian highlands following capture of Addis Ababa (April 6). Supply lines from Kenya via captured Italian depots. Primary constraint: long distance from South African ports (Mombasa 1200km). Division preparing for redeployment to Egypt in late Q2/early Q3 1941.
